Key Match Events: Alec Bohm went 4-for-5 with one home run and four RBIs in a 12-2 victory over the Mets on Friday night
Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies are gearing up for an NL East crown, and Alec Bohm is looking forward to the excitement of the moment
Post-Match Reflections: Alec Bohm is giving himself grace after returning from an injury and adjusting to his role in the lineup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies are seeking their first NL East title since 2011
Others: Bryce Harper praised Alec Bohm's performance, saying he's been great and expects him to show up in the postseason
